text: Millie Bobby Brown (born 19 February 2004) is a British actress and producer. She began acting in 2013. She is best known for her role as Eleven in the Netflix series Stranger Things (since 2016). The role gave her a Primetime Emmy Award nomination. She appeared in the 2019 Godzilla sequel, Godzilla: King of the Monsters and played a staring role in Enola Holmes. Brown has also starred in the music video of the Maroon 5 song "Girls Like You". She has also released a new line of makeup and skincare called “Florence by Mills” Brown was born in Marbella, Andalusia, Spain, to British parents. She grew up in Bournemouth, England.
